docs.snippet: Robert F. Kennedy’s eldest daughter, Kathleen Kennedy Townsend, said the 41st president plans to vote Democratic in the presidential election....

headline.main: Elder Bush Plans to Vote for Hillary Clinton, a Kennedy Says

docs.snippet: When Mr. Trump, a close adviser to his father, likened Syrian refugees to deadly Skittles, it was not the first time he had been accused of poor taste....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Mr. Trump, a close adviser to his father, likened Syrian refugees to deadly Skittles, it was not the first time he had been accused of poor taste.
docs.abstract: Twitter post by Donald Trump Jr comparing Syrian refugees to Skittles and warning of terrorist attacks by asylum seekers draws widespread censure from Democrats and others for his poor taste; post fits pattern of Trump Jr's statements, which in past have referred to white supremacy, anti-Semitism and conspiracy theories.

headline.main: Donald Trump Jr.’s Skittles Tweet Fits a Pattern
headline.print_headline: Skittles Post by Trump Son Fits a Pattern

docs.snippet: In the last General Assembly address of his presidency, Mr. Obama was focused as much on the American presidential election as on his legacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the last General Assembly address of his presidency, Mr. Obama was focused as much on the American presidential election as on his legacy.
docs.abstract: Pres Obama, gives final address at United Nations General Assembly, presenting stark choice between world striving for cooperation and integration or one comprised of divided and isolated nations; takes aim at leaders of countries mired in rising nationalism as well as at presidential candidate Donald Trump; leaves American foreign policy to be determined by his successor.

headline.main: Obama, in Farewell to U.N., Paints Stark Choices for Unsettled World
headline.print_headline: Obama, in Farewell to U.N., Paints Stark Choices for World

docs.snippet: Mr. Adelson, the Las Vegas casino magnate, donated $40 million to Republicans in House and Senate races, with only $5 million going to Mr. Trump’s campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Adelson, the Las Vegas casino magnate, donated $40 million to Republicans in House and Senate races, with only $5 million going to Mr. Trump’s campaign.
docs.abstract: Las Vegas casino magnate Sheldon G Adelson deals major setback to Donald Trump's efforts to rally some of wealthiest Republican donors by giving more than $40 million to groups backing Republican congressional candidates in down-ballot races; decision reflects reluctance of many of GOP's most deep-pocketed donors to invest in Trump.

headline.main: Sheldon Adelson Focuses on Congressional Races, Despite Donald Trump’s Pleas
headline.print_headline: Adelson Focuses on Congressional Races, Despite Trump’s Pleas

byline.contributor: Rachel Shorey, Nick Corasaniti and Jonathan Martin contributed reporting.
byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and MAGGIE HABERMAN
